TextView.android:text: Did you see anyone for antenatal care during your pregnancy with baby/[name]? (HERE ANTENATAL CARE REFERS TO HEALTHCARE SERVICES RATHER THAN SPIRITUAL SERVICES FROM A COMMUNITY SHAMAN)
How many times did you receive antenatal care during your pregnancy with baby/[name]?
Do you have an antenatal care (ANC) card?
What are the reasons why you did not attend antenatal care at least four times during your pregnancy with baby/[name]
Do you have any prescriptions for your antenatal care checkup during this pregnancy period?
As part of your antenatal care during this pregnancy, did a healthcare provider do.
Talk with you about foods to eat?
Talk with you about vaginal bleeding
